data.name: My Pet Sitter is a Futanari
data.detailed_description:
Complaints from the neighbors have forced you to get a Pet Sitter to look after your dog while you're out for long periods of time.
The Pet Sitter is practically a dog whisperer and knows everything there is to know about the psychology of the canine variety.
She adores your four-legged friend and also seems to have taken a liking to you.

Can your Pet Sitter teach an old dog new tricks?

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
Sexy Voice Acting
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: Can your Pet Sitter teach an old dog new tricks? Are you willing to play nice? Good boy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
